title: Max Keiser and Stacy Herbert: El Salvador and being early to Bitcoin
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente speaks with Max Keiser and Stacy Herbert to discuss the early days of Bitcoin, first hand experience in El Salvador, global macro, and more. You can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!
